hero.subtitle: Get your Electronic Travel Authorization quickly and securely. The standard requirement for visitors to the UK.

info.title: What is UK ETA?
info.subtitle: The Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA) is a new requirement for people who do not need a visa to come to the UK. It is electronically linked to your passport.
info.card1_desc: Most applications are processed within 3 business days.
info.card2_desc: Valid for multiple trips over a 2-year period.
info.card3_desc: No need to visit an embassy or provide physical documents.

how_to_apply.title: How to Apply
how_to_apply.step1_desc: Complete our simple online application form with your details.
how_to_apply.step2_desc: Securely pay the processing fee and review your information.
how_to_apply.step3_desc: Get your approved ETA sent directly to your email.

requirements.title: Requirements
requirements.subtitle: Checklist
requirements.description: Ensure you have the following documents and details ready before starting your application for a smooth and successful process.
requirements.eligibility_desc: Not sure if you need an ETA? Use our interactive checker to find out in seconds.

items.passport_desc: Must be from an eligible country and valid for your entire stay.
items.photo_desc: A clear, recent digital photo according to official specifications.
items.email_desc: Necessary to receive your application status and approved ETA.
items.payment_desc: Credit or debit card to pay the mandatory application fee.

faq.title: Frequently Asked
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to the most common questions about the UK Electronic Travel Authorization.
faq.cta_title: Ready to visit the United Kingdom?
faq.cta_desc: Get your UK Electronic Travel Authorization today. The process is quick, simple, and entirely online.

questions.a1: The UK ETA is required for nationals of countries who do not currently need a visa to enter the UK for short stays (up to 6 months), including for tourism, visiting family, or business.
questions.q2: How long is the ETA valid for?
questions.a2: An approved UK ETA is valid for two years from the date of issue, or until your passport expires, whichever comes first. It allows for multiple entries into the UK during this period.
questions.q3: How long does the application take to process?
questions.a3: Most applications are processed within 3 working days. However, we recommend applying at least 1-2 weeks before your planned travel date to account for any potential delays.
questions.a4: Yes, every traveler, including babies and children, must have their own individual ETA linked to their passport to enter the United Kingdom.
questions.q5: Is the ETA a guarantee of entry?
questions.a5: No, like a visa, an ETA does not guarantee entry. Border Force officers at the UK port of entry will make the final decision on whether to allow you into the country.

common.englishRequirement: All fields must be completed in English

step1.title: Travel Information
step1.subtitle: Enter your travel and passport details

subtexts.otherNationalities: Include any nationalities you have had in the past.
subtexts.passportCopy: The photo must be unaltered, clear, without glare, and show all 4 corners.
subtexts.passportGuideline: The photo must be unaltered, clear, without glare, and show all 4 corners.

subtexts.email: The email address where you want to receive your ETA decision
subtexts.photo: The photo must be unaltered, recently taken, with a plain light background.
subtexts.photoGuideline: The photo must be unaltered, recently taken, with a plain light background.

labels.terrorismQuestion: Have you ever been involved in, or suspected of, any of the following?
labels.hasCriminalRecord: Do you have any criminal convictions?

checklist.item1: War crimes, genocide or crimes against humanity
checklist.item2: Terrorism including support for, or membership of, terrorist groups

subtexts.criminalGuideline: Include any convictions, even if they occurred many years ago or in another country.

confirmInfo.title: Information Confirmation
confirmInfo.text: By sending this application, you confirm that, to the best of your knowledge, the information you have given is correct.
confirmInfo.warning: If you have given any false information: your application can be refused, you may be prosecuted, you may be banned from the UK. If you are applying on behalf of someone else you must have confirmed with them that the application is complete and correct.

acceptTerms.title: Terms and Conditions
acceptTerms.text: I have read and understood the Terms and Conditions and the Privacy Policy. The price includes processing fee (£81).

confirmProcessingTime.title: Processing Time
confirmProcessingTime.text: I understand that processing may take UP TO 3 BUSINESS DAYS and confirm that my arrival date in the UK will not be earlier than 3 BUSINESS DAYS FROM TODAY.

recaptcha.text: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google

step7.title: Application Submitted!
step7.subtitle: Thank you for your application. We have sent a confirmation email to your provided address. Your ETA decision is usually processed within 3 business days.

whatsNext.title: What happens next?
whatsNext.step2: We'll review your application within 3 business days
whatsNext.step3: Receive your approved ETA via email

about.mission_p1: At NextStop Visa, we are dedicated to simplifying international travel. We specialize in providing streamlined visa and ETA application assistance for travelers worldwide.
about.mission_p2: Our team of Travel Experts ensures that every application is reviewed with precision and care, minimizing errors and delays.
about.mission_disclaimer: We are a private travel consultancy and are not affiliated with any government.
about.mission_p3: With our expertise, you can confidently plan your journey to the UK, knowing that your travel authorization is in capable hands.
